Tequila Fizz (Tequila Collins - Ranch Water)

tequila
fizz

Ingredients

  • 1.5 oz tequila
  • 1 oz lemon or lime juice (for tequila collins and ranch water respectively)
  • 1/2 oz simple syrup or agave nectar (optional)
  • 3-4 oz club soda

Procedure

  1. Pour ingredients (except club soda) into a shaker with ice
  2. Shake until chilled
  3. Strain into highball glass with fresh ice
  4. Top with club soda and stir gently to combine
